content: Good piece, thanks. I think the word “cynic” is used too much, and wrongly. It’s irrelevant, both for self-important puffed-up Scalia, and lean mean all “serious” bizniss Gorsuch. Both these delusionals are/were fundamentalists at heart, and Gorsuch will, we should bet, behave so if given the chance (and he will, unfortunately for the USA)
